hero.title: Smart Farming Solutions
hero.subtitle: AI-Powered Agricultural Advisor for Indian Farmers
hero.description: Get expert advice on crops, weather, diseases, and farming techniques with our advanced AI assistant.
hero.explore_description: Discover how our AI-powered tools can transform your farming experience
hero.start_description: Join thousands of farmers who are already using BhoomiSetu to increase their yields and profits

crop_advice.title: Crop Advice
crop_advice.description: Get personalized crop suggestions based on soil conditions, climate data, and market trends. Maximize your profits with data-driven decisions.

weather_updates.title: Weather Updates
weather_updates.description: Access real-time weather data and forecasts tailored for agriculture. Plan irrigation, harvesting, and field activities with confidence.

disease_detection.title: Disease Detection
disease_detection.description: Upload a photo of your plant and get instant AI-powered disease identification with treatment recommendations. Early detection saves your crops and increases yield.

market_prices.title: Market Prices
market_prices.description: Stay updated with real-time commodity prices from mandis across India. Know when and where to sell for maximum profit.

government_schemes.title: Government Schemes
government_schemes.description: Information about agricultural subsidies and government support programs.

expert_chat.title: Expert Chat
expert_chat.description: Chat with our AI agricultural expert for instant farming guidance.

chat.title: Chat with AI Agricultural Expert
chat.placeholder: Ask about crops, weather, diseases, or farming techniques...
chat.error: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
chat.empty_message: Please enter a message to get started!
chat.welcome_description: Your intelligent agricultural advisor for Indian farming. Ask me about crops, weather, market prices, government schemes, or any farming-related questions.

crop_recommender.title: Crop Recommender
crop_recommender.subtitle: Get AI-powered crop recommendations based on your soil and climate conditions

disease_detection.title: Plant Disease Detection

disease_detection.drag_drop: Drag and drop an image here, or click to select

agrixchange.subtitle: Direct Farmer-to-Market Platform
agrixchange.description: Revolutionizing agriculture by eliminating middlemen and connecting farmers directly with consumers and retailers. Increase your profits by up to 40% through our transparent marketplace.
agrixchange.extension_description: AgriXchange is our marketplace extension that complements BhoomiSetu's AI advisory services. Get farming advice here, then sell your produce directly on AgriXchange!
agrixchange.problem_description: Traditional agricultural supply chains involve multiple intermediaries who take substantial cuts from farmers' earnings. This leaves farmers with minimal profits despite their hard work, while consumers pay higher prices for fresh produce.
agrixchange.direct_connection_desc: Connect farmers directly with consumers, retailers, and wholesalers without any intermediaries taking cuts from profits.
agrixchange.increased_profits_desc: Farmers can earn 30-60% more by selling directly to buyers and setting their own fair prices for quality produce.
agrixchange.transparent_trading_desc: Live bidding system ensures fair pricing with complete transparency in all transactions and quality certifications.
agrixchange.easy_access_desc: User-friendly platform accessible on any device with support for multiple Indian languages and simple registration.
agrixchange.farmer_feature_1: List produce for both retail and wholesale markets
agrixchange.farmer_feature_5: Set your own prices and negotiate directly
agrixchange.consumer_feature_1: Buy fresh produce directly from farmers
agrixchange.consumer_feature_2: Filter by location, price, and quality
agrixchange.cta_description: Join thousands of farmers already increasing their profits through direct sales
